name: Notion Minimalist Resume (CV)
description: The only CV you will ever needWhen we searched for CVs on Notion, we always found one problem. When we wanted to export the CV as a PDF, it never looked pretty. So we decided to create a resume template as minimalist as possible, which will look great in Notion as well as in PDF. We hope we succeeded.Note: When you export your CV as a PDF, don't forget to change the "Scale percent to 70"FAQHow to download the template?Open the template link, then click the "Duplicate" button in the top-right cor
